QuestData.Title: What's Yours Is Mine
QuestData.Description: The elders want us to mount a defense? We're not monks, $c; we need weapons if we hope to fight!$B$BScavenge some arms from those barbarians for me. I should be able to melt them down and make something more suitable for our villagers to fight with.$b$bBring me as many as you can carry and I'll take care of the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve 6 Stolen Weapons from the Zandalari Invaders.
QuestData.CompletionText: We'll need more than luck to get us through this. I hope you found something I can work with.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, these are better than I had anticipated! I can make four spears for every one of their blades.$b$bDon't you worry, I'll make sure the villagers are armed when the time comes.
